subject: Clutch problems
description_text: hello i updated my pro x pedals firmware and now my clutch is spazzing out like this and the dead zone to make it stop is basically all the way to 15% but its way too sensitive and it jumps all over the place what can i do?

conversations.body_text: Hi Danilo Rodezno, Hello, thanks for your feedback. We checked the video you uploaded, but it appears to be incomplete, so we’re unable to open it properly for analysis. Could you please upload the video to Google Drive, set the sharing permission to “Anyone with the link can view (Viewer)”, and then send us the share link? Once we receive it, we’ll review it right away.
